price: (Abamalayika bazababwira) bati “Mukoranye inkozi z’ibibi n’abambari bazo ndetse n’ibyo basengaga,
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
